name: Light Bulbs needed
description:
Light Bulbs Needed

Was developed in 48 hours for the lux game jam #01

Not the best game out there but the first game I ever really made, so I am still proud.

There are a few things I would have liked to be changed but weren't possible due to a tight schedule that weekend. For example I forgot to mention that you can quit by pressing ESC.

I am happy that you took the time looking at my game.
